title: tuyaruTriDAmal
sahitya:
tuyaruTriDAmal un tuNai peTru aDiyEn bhayamaTru vAzh krpai sheyya vENum murugayyE


anupallavi

  payanaTrup-pADu pala pADupaTTu mati keTTiDAmal bhaya bhaktiyODu un pAdam paTri viTTiDEn


caraNam    tayakkamE illAmal dayavuDan aDiyArin tArakanAit-tulangi pAril viLangum ayyE
viyakkumArunnaruLai vIsum perumai sirakka mayakkamurAmal en matiyil oLi pirakka
